title: Streaming high diamond solo queue!
body:
Hi guys, I'm an ADC main and finished in Diamond 3 at the end of season 4, I am now currently D2 30lp. I've recently started streaming and if anyones keen to see how people play in the top 0.5% in Oceania come have a look and say hi :) www.twitch.tv/global_lol

A follow is greatly appreciated if you enjoy, thanks alot.

replies.body: Any chance u can play trist next game if all suits ofc?
Hi, yeah I'm from NZ and just message me in twitch chat when you're on and I'll try play trist :)
Your a Kiwi i take it?
I hate that you  have to have a facebook accnt to comment, but hi anyways.
